newsitem.title: JAPAN: Fuji TV's initial share offer price 550,000 yen.
newsitem.headline: Fuji TV's initial share offer price 550,000 yen.

text.p: Japanese broadcaster Fuji Television Network Inc's initial share offer price was set at 550,000 yen, the Tokyo Stock Exchange (TSE) said on Tuesday.
Fuji TV will be listed on the first section of the TSE on August 8.
Earlier the TSE said that in the auction held on Tuesday, the weighted average price of successful bids in Fuji TV's share auction was 615,735 yen.
Besides the share offer through the auction, Fuji TV said it would sell 84,000 new shares and an already issued 30,500 shares.
The subscription period is from August 1 to August 4, and the payment date is August 7, it said.
